company.tagline: We build AI to serve humanity’s long-term well-being.
company.description: Anthropic is dedicated to building systems that people can rely on and generating research about the opportunities and risks of AI. We aim to build frontier AI systems that are reliable, interpretable, and steerable, conducting research, applying safety techniques, and deploying systems through partnerships and products.

growth_metrics.geographic_expansion: Opened offices in Tokyo, Seoul, and expanded operations to India.
growth_metrics.revenue_info: Anthropic raises $13B Series F at $183B post-money valuation

events.title: Anthropic raises $13B Series F at $183B post-money valuation
events.description: Anthropic has successfully completed its Series F funding round, raising $13 billion, thereby achieving a post-money valuation of $183 billion.

events.title: Anthropic officially opens Tokyo office
events.description: Anthropic has officially opened its Tokyo office and signed a Memorandum of Cooperation with the Japan AI Safety Institute.

events.title: Anthropic and Iceland announce national AI education pilot
events.description: Anthropic collaborates with Iceland to introduce one of the world's first national AI education pilots.

events.title: Anthropic and Salesforce expand partnership
events.description: Anthropic and Salesforce have expanded their partnership to bring Claude to regulated industries.

events.title: Rahul Patil joins Anthropic as Chief Technology Officer
events.description: Rahul Patil has been appointed as the Chief Technology Officer of Anthropic.

events.title: Seoul becomes Anthropic’s third office in Asia-Pacific
events.description: Anthropic has opened its third office in Asia-Pacific in Seoul, marking continued international growth.

events.title: Anthropic launches higher education advisory board
events.description: Anthropic has launched a higher education advisory board and AI Fluency courses.

events.title: Paul Smith to join Anthropic as Chief Commercial Officer
events.description: Paul Smith has been appointed as the Chief Commercial Officer of Anthropic.

events.title: Introducing Claude Haiku 4.5
events.description: Anthropic introduces Claude Haiku 4.5, a new product release.

events.title: Anthropic and the Department of Defense to advance AI
events.description: Anthropic partners with the Department of Defense to advance responsible AI in defense operations.
